title: Alvin und die Chipmunks 3: Chipbruch
description: Playing around while aboard a cruise ship, the Chipmunks and Chipettes accidentally go overboard and end up marooned in a tropical paradise. They discover their new turf is not as deserted as it seems.
castList: [Jason Lee, David Cross, Jenny Slate, Justin Long, Matthew Gray Gubler, Jesse McCartney, Amy Poehler, Anna Faris, Christina Applegate, Alan Tudyk, Michael P. Northey, Sophia Aguiar, Lauren Gottlieb, Tera Perez, Andy Buckley]
characterList: [Dave, Ian, Zoe, Alvin (voice), Simon (voice), Theodore (voice), Eleanor (voice), Jeanette (voice), Brittany (voice), Simone (voice), Hawaiian Shirt Guy (as Michael Northey), Club Woman #1, Club Woman #2, Club Woman #3, Captain Correlli]
